author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: NFT Game Assets API - [Revelar]
description: Game designers / developers need a simple and standard process for game asset generation prior to minting.
solution: Create an API that can take bulk art assets, by layer, and create final assets and metadata (CIP-25) ready to mint.
experience: A decade as a Tech Founder & CTO + Plutus Pioneer + Fund 6 + alongside a full team of engineers. (See below)
